messages.message:
Hi team,
Just wanted to share my experience that I spent quite some time to figure out the inter-pod connectivity for a change I was testing in my sandbox.
Later was reminded of a good doc we already have for how we add a new service/port in our setup (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/x/HAD8d).
So just re-sharing it here in case you ever run into these issues.
